name: Mods Pro - for Minecraft PE
description:
From the makers of Skins Pro Creator for Minecraft comes the ultimate Minecraft Mods app. This app comes packed full of mods for Minecraft Pocket Edition!

  Browse through an ever growing list of mods, start your own server, then try out mods for yourself. This App requires an Internet connection so we can provide the latest and greatest mods.   

Features Include:  
- Growing list of PE Mods
- Detailed instructions
- We also make high quality YouTube videos
- Simple 3 step setup
 - Universal app with custom design for iPhone/iPod Touch AND iPad 
- New mods added WITHOUT updating the app. 

Download the BEST mods app for Minecraft today!

Seejaykay apps and websites are family friendly.

This app and Seejaykay LLC are not affiliated with Mojang AB or Notch Development. Mojang AB is the legal creator of Minecraft. All graphical assets of Minecraft and its trademark are owned by Mojang AB.
